parameters.name: KeyWord
parameters.description: The keyword for searches in "%KeyWord%" mode. The value is not case-sensitive.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page **1**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: **1 to 100**. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: StartDate
parameters.description: The start date of the query. Specify the start date in the **YYYY-MM-DD** format.

parameters.name: UserClientIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the client.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date of the query. Specify the end date in the **YYYY-MM-DD** format.
